title: Quad legendary mystery box and Mystery champion
body: Is riot bringing back the quad chest drops for finals and the mystery champion boxes? Want to knock out the rest of the champions I don't got. Wanna have 1 skin for each champ to.

replies.body:
That [**Baron Steal and Pentakill Mystery Chest multiplier**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/worlds-hits-the-rift-2017/) has indeed been active throughout this years Worlds! 

https://i.gyazo.com/25fa24f5378cdc148bc5e3bb2804adbc.png
